sub_title: Lead Service Delivery Coordinator at Baker Hughes
summary:
Completions Engineer with 6+ years of experience in oil and gas industry, consolidated knowledge from quotation to invoicing included technical support and installation process of Completions Systems. Self motivated, performance driven, team oriented professional with international experience in 4 countries for different operators with different roles within Baker Hughes. Successfully graduated from Baker Hughes 3 year LEAD program with technical, administrative and management skills.  

My key experience is:
Full Supervision on below Completion systems:
*  Single-zone, Multi-zone and Multilateral Level 5 Completions with:
-  Packers Systems: Permanents & Retrievable, Hydraulic, Mechanical and Hydrostatic set
-  Surface Controlled Sub-Surface Safety Systems 
-  Intelligent Production Systems with Permanent Downhole Monitoring Systems
-  Intelligent Well Systems with Hydraulic sliding sleeves and Chemical Injection Valves
-  Liner Hanger Systems
